## Disposable.onDispose() method

Subscribe to the event when the resource is disposed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onDispose(callback: () => void): Unsubscribe;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | () =&gt; void | THe callback to call when the resource is disposed |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Unsubscribe](./workflow.unsubscribe.md)

A function that unsubscribes the callback
